targets.query: SELECT last("SML_Total_out") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = 'tele/emh_ehz/SENSOR') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("PIKO_ENERGY_actual") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = 'KOSTAL') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT difference(last("SML_Total_out")) FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = 'tele/emh_ehz/SENSOR') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT difference(last("SML_Total_out")) FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = 'tele/emh_ehz/SENSOR') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_difference(last("PIKO_ENERGY_total")) FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = 'KOSTAL') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_difference(last("PIKO_ENERGY_daily")) FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = 'KOSTAL') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(null)
SELECT mean("PIKO_IN_STRING1_current") - mean("PIKO_IN_STRING3_current") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = 'KOSTAL') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("PIKO_IN_STRING1_voltage") - mean("PIKO_IN_STRING3_voltage") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" = 'KOSTAL') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.description: select the database, where the data is
list.name: influxdb
